Class CSCD211Lab6LinkedListMethods

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object
    Some basic methods we will need to use in conjunction with the LinkedList class
    NOTE:
    All parameters will be final and all preconditions met

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static String buildAString​(Scanner kb)
      Prompts the user for a String and reads the String from the keyboard
      static int menu​(Scanner kb)
      menu method for testing your linked list
      1) Print the List
      2) Create a BoxCar and addFirst
      3) Create a BoxCar and addLast
      4) Create a BoxCar, read and index and add -- at the index
      5) Create a BoxCar, check the list to see if the list contains the BoxCar
      6) Create a BoxCar, find the indexOf that BoxCar
      7) removeFirst
      8) removeLast
      9) Read index remove Node at that index
      10) Create a BoxCar and removeFirstOccurrence of that BoxCar
      11) Create a BoxCar and removeLastOccurrence of that BoxCar
      12) clear the list
      13) Print the size of the list
      14) Quit
      You must ensure the value entered in within range
      static int readIndex​(Scanner kb)
      readIndex reads a value greater than -1

    • Method Detail

      • menu

        public static int menu​(Scanner kb)
        menu method for testing your linked list
        1) Print the List
        2) Create a BoxCar and addFirst
        3) Create a BoxCar and addLast
        4) Create a BoxCar, read and index and add -- at the index
        5) Create a BoxCar, check the list to see if the list contains the BoxCar
        6) Create a BoxCar, find the indexOf that BoxCar
        7) removeFirst
        8) removeLast
        9) Read index remove Node at that index
        10) Create a BoxCar and removeFirstOccurrence of that BoxCar
        11) Create a BoxCar and removeLastOccurrence of that BoxCar
        12) clear the list
        13) Print the size of the list
        14) Quit
        You must ensure the value entered in within range
        Parameters:
        kb - Representing the Scanner Object
        Returns:
        int - The choice guaranteed by you to be between 1 and 14 inclusive
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if kb is null
        NOTE:
        The input buffer will be left clean

      • buildAString

        public static String buildAString​(Scanner kb)
        Prompts the user for a String and reads the String from the keyboard
        Parameters:
        kb - The Scanner object
        Returns:
        String The String read from the keyboard
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if kb is null
        NOTE:

      • readIndex

        public static int readIndex​(Scanner kb)
        readIndex reads a value greater than -1
        Parameters:
        kb - The Scanner object
        Returns:
        int - The index will be guaranteed by you to be greater than -1
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if kb is null
        NOTE:
        The input buffer will be left clean
